statements: SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM judicial_decisions WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions WHERE decision_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT summary FROM judicial_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_id, case_name, judge_name FROM judicial_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_name, judge_name, decision_date FROM judicial_decisions WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(case_id) AS total_cases FROM judicial_decisions;
SELECT judge_name, COUNT(*) AS cases_handled FROM judicial_decisions GROUP BY judge_name ORDER BY cases_handled DESC;
SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_cases;
SELECT case_name, judge_name FROM human_rights_cases WHERE human_rights_violation = TRUE;
SELECT case_name, decision_date FROM human_rights_cases ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM case_comments WHERE commenter_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_cases WHERE human_rights_violation = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, judge_name FROM human_rights_cases ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, commenter_name, comment_text FROM human_rights_cases JOIN case_comments ON human_rights_cases.case_id = case_comments.case_id;
SELECT * FROM case_comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT case_id, case_name, judge_name, decision_date FROM human_rights_cases WHERE human_rights_violation = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsCases;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM HumanRightsCases;
SELECT case_name, case_date, court_name FROM HumanRightsCases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_specialty FROM Judges;
SELECT precedent_name, precedent_date FROM LegalPrecedents ORDER BY precedent_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsCases
SELECT case_name, case_date, court_name FROM HumanRightsCases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Judges ORDER BY judge_experience DESC
SELECT judge_name, judge_specialty FROM Judges WHERE judge_specialty IS NOT NULL
SELECT case_name, precedent_name FROM HumanRightsCases INNER JOIN LegalPrecedents ON HumanRightsCases.case_id = LegalPrecedents.case_id
SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions ORDER BY date_of_decision DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT case_title, judge_name FROM judicial_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Extrajudicial Killing';
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT country_name, region FROM countries WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' ORDER BY date_of_decision DESC;
SELECT case_title, judge_name, summary FROM judicial_decisions WHERE date_of_decision BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT decision_id, case_title, judge_name FROM judicial_decisions WHERE summary LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Extrajudicial Killing' ORDER BY date_reported ASC;
SELECT violation_id, victim_name, description FROM human_rights_violations WHERE date_reported <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM countries;
SELECT country_name, population FROM countries ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT paper_title, author FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT judge_name, nationality FROM judges WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT issue_title, issue_description FROM human_rights_issues WHERE LENGTH(issue_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM judicial_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT judge_name, nationality FROM judges WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT issue_title FROM human_rights_issues WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(issue_description) > 100;
SELECT country_name, population FROM countries WHERE population > 100000000;
SELECT paper_title, author, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
